solution_line_template: The old budget was ${old_budget} because {num_dodgeballs} x {dodgeball_cost} = <<{num_dodgeballs}*{dodgeball_cost}={old_budget}>>{old_budget}
They are adding ${budget_increase_amount} to the budget because {old_budget} x {budget_increase_percent} = <<{old_budget}*{budget_increase_percent}={budget_increase_amount}>>{budget_increase_amount}
They can buy {num_softballs} softballs on the new budget because {new_budget} / {softball_cost} = <<{new_budget}/{softball_cost}={num_softballs}>>{num_softballs}
